thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nothing amazing, but suited my basic needs
thread.title_full: Nothing amazing, but suited my basic needs - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: LemonyLlama
title: Nothing amazing, but suited my basic needs
text:
I visited Westin for a conference that was paid for by my employer. Regardless, the price was a little on the higher end for what I'd typically pay.
Overall, it was a positive experience. The room was clean with modern embellishments in what would be otherwise plain accommodations. I slept pretty well and didn't experience any interruptions.
The restaurant in the hotel was overpriced, especially considering the quality of the food. Although I will note that the food catered for the conference was pretty good.
I wish I would've made it to the swimming pool, as it looked inviting. There were a lot of nooks and spots in the lobby area for people to hang out during breaks.
Overall, a nice and well-kept property with a friendly staff. Nothing extraordinary, just a solid place that suited my needs and did a good job hosting the conference.
Aside from the nearby highway, the scenery around the hotel is beautiful. It is within walking distance from an In-N-Out Burger and a couple convenience stores -- although the store I wandered into late one night seemed a bit sketchy.
It is also quite handily located close to a BART station, so if you want to catch a train to downtown San Francisco, it's a little bit of a stroll to get there, but completely worth it. No need for a vehicle, which is a huge plus!
Room Tip: The higher the floor, the better See more room tips
